Comment: While the student made an effort to discuss God's love and judgment, the main focus of God's judgment being based on His perfect righteousness and justice was not adequately addressed. Continuing to study and reflect on the scriptural teachings regarding God's judgment will help in providing more accurate and comprehensive responses in the future.
